knownIssues.summary:
When History Tracking is enabled in a scratch Org on a standard object and/or standard field that metadata change is not pulled down with a force:source:pull.  

Result is that History tracking changes cannot be pushed to another Scratch Org.
knownIssues.title: SFDX force:source:push command fails on History Tracking

knownIssues.summary: 'sfdx force:source:push' will not push changes to detail object alone in M-D relationship
knownIssues.title: 'sfdx force:source:push' will not push changes to detail object alone in M-D relationship

knownIssues.summary: SharingModel change is not getting updated in Unlocked Package.
knownIssues.title: SharingModel change is ignored in Unlocked Package

knownIssues.summary: When overriding mobile View action with lightning component , it does not detect source change when we do source:pull command
knownIssues.title: Overriding mobile View action with lightning component does not detect source change with source:pull

knownIssues.summary: When you add an Action Override to a Custom Object or Custom Lightning App that already exists in your local copy of the metadata, the sfdx force:src:pull does not detect the change. The updates to the Custom Object or Custom Lightning App are not pulled to your local.
knownIssues.title: SFDX: sfdx force:src:pull does not detect Action Override added to a CustomObject or Custom Lightning App

knownIssues.summary: Metadata Deployment fails if there is history tracking in custom lookup field with look up filters, when the filter refers to a field with tracking to custom object in the same deployment transaction.
knownIssues.title: Deployment fails with duplicate value found: <unknown> duplicates value on record with id: <unknown> error
